Welcome to Trix

Trix is a rich text editor for everyday writing. It's the editor that powers Basecamp and HEY.

What Makes Trix Different

Most WYSIWYG editors are wrappers around HTML's contenteditable and execCommand APIs, designed by Microsoft to support live editing of web pages in Internet Explorer 5.5.

Trix sidesteps these inconsistencies by treating contenteditable as an I/O device: when input makes its way to the editor, Trix converts that input into an editing operation on its internal document model, then re-renders that document back into the editor.

Features

  • A document model that handles text and attachments
  • Undo and redo that keeps your changes safe
  • Native drag and drop for images and files

Code Example

<trix-editor input="content"></trix-editor>
<input id="content" type="hidden" name="content">

Browser Support

Trix works in all modern browsers including:

  1. Chrome and Chromium-based browsers
  2. Firefox
  3. Safari on macOS and iOS
  4. Microsoft Edge

For more details, see the GitHub repository.
